channel.title: Implementation on xiaruize's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Implementation on xiaruize's Blog

item.title: University Ranking Frontend Deep Dive (Part 1): Navigation Architecture & Search Implementation
item.description: Part 1 of our deep dive into the University Ranking Frontend. We explore the navigation orchestration in App.js, implement the SearchScreen with real-time filtering and bottom sheet modals, and build the DetailPage for university profiles.
